random.line: What? Oh, hi. I didn't see you there.
Where did you hear that word from?
I read it in one of your books. Tell me what it means!
It means what goes on in your head.
Sister, do you know what time it is?
Well, you're up so it must be after 10:00.
Yeah, it's almost 12:00! What took you so long to get up? I was so bored!
